description.message: Use AdGuard VPN to surf the Internet fast, safely, and securely. Protect your privacy and stay anonymous with our private VPN proxy.

options_support_report_description.message: Send us a report on a potential bug

options_bug_report_include_log_label.message: Include the diagnostic report in the message

options_bug_report_request_error.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.

options_bug_report_page_success.message: Thank you, your message sent successfully!

account_sign_out_description.message: You’ll be logged out of your account. VPN protection will be stopped

settings_referral_info.message: Send an invite link to your friend. When they sign up to AdGuard VPN via your link, you both get %your_gb% GB of fast VPN. The unused amount doesn’t expire — you can use it over the months. Invite up to %max_friends% friends and get up to %total_gb% GB in total

settings_free_gbs_subtitle.message: Here’s how you can get extra VPN traffic

settings_free_gbs_add_device_title_gb.message: Add a new device and get %your_gb% GB for free

settings_free_gbs_add_device_info_gb.message: Log in to AdGuard VPN on another device with %email% to get a one-time %your_gb% GB bonus

settings_free_gbs_add_device_wait_to_upd.message: Your monthly limit may take time to update — give it a couple of minutes or restart the app

settings_free_gbs_devices_added_title_gb.message: You got %your_gb% GB for adding a new device

settings_free_gbs_devices_added_info.message: Unused traffic carries over to next months. And with AdGuard VPN Unlimited, you can enjoy fast browsing without limits

settings_free_gbs_invite_friend_title.message: Invite a friend and get %your_gb% GB of fast VPN

settings_free_gbs_invite_friend_title_su.message: You’ve invited %total_invites% friends and got %total_gbs% GB in total

settings_free_gbs_invite_friend_complete.message: Thank you for helping us grow! Learn how to get more bonuses in the Free GBs section. Or get AdGuard VPN Unlimited to enjoy fast browsing without limits

settings_webrtc_desc.message: Block WebRTC, a known vulnerability that can leak your real IP address even if you use a proxy or VPN

settings_context_menus_title.message: Display AdGuard VPN in the browser context menu

settings_context_menus_description.message: Manage VPN exclusions for a specific website

settings_help_us_improve_modal_desc_data.message: Names of screens you interact with

settings_help_us_improve_modal_desc_impr.message: We need this information to analyze and improve the functionality of AdGuard VPN

settings_help_us_improve_modal_desc_inte.message: This data is anonymous and only used internally. We never share it with third parties

settings_dns_description.message: Resolve DNS requests, block ads and trackers, and encrypt DNS traffic when you're connected to VPN

settings_dns_selector_default_desc.message: Uses DNS servers provided by AdGuard VPN

settings_dns_selector_adguard_desc.message: Removes ads and trackers from your device

settings_dns_selector_adguard_nonfilteri.message: Secure DNS with no activity logging (does not filter ads & trackers)

settings_dns_selector_adguard_family_des.message: AdGuard DNS + SafeSearch and adult content blocking

settings_dns_selector_google_desc.message: Free alternative DNS service by Google

settings_dns_selector_cisco_desc.message: DNS server that protects your device from malware

settings_dns_selector_quad9_desc.message: Free alternative DNS service with protection from phishing and spyware

settings_quick_connect_subtitle.message: VPN location selected when you click Connect

settings_exclusion_group_settings_subtit.message: AdGuard VPN is off for the checked domains and subdomains
AdGuard VPN is on for the checked domains and subdomains

settings_exclusions_add_invalid_domain.message: "%url%" is not a valid domain. Do you want to add it to the list?

settings_exclusion_reset_service_confirm.message: Reset the default settings for %hostname%? This will restore any missing domains and set all check marks to on.

settings_exclusions_remove_all_exclusion.message: Do you want to remove the entire list of exclusions?

settings_exclusion_general_mode_info.message: VPN is on everywhere except for the websites below

settings_exclusion_selective_mode_info.message: VPN is on selectively: only for the websites below

settings_exclusion_selective_mode_warnin.message: Leaving this list empty disables VPN for all websites

global_error_description.message: Please contact us if you keep seeing this message

authentication_successful_notification.message: Successfully authenticated! You can open AdGuard VPN and start using it.

control_error_title.message: Disable another VPN extension to connect

control_error_description.message: It looks like another VPN extension is controlling your connection. To use AdGuard VPN, please disable the other extension

endpoints_empty_saved.message: To see locations here, select All and click the icon next to a location
endpoints_empty_saved.description: Respect spaces between text and tags. Use <b> tag for bold text

popup_traffic_limit_exceeded_description.message: You've reached the free data limit, and AdGuard VPN works slowly

popup_feedback_title.message: We'd love to hear your feedback

popup_confirm_rate_modal_rate_title.message: Wow! Can you rate us also in the Extension Store?

popup_server_error_popup_info.message: Most likely, the VPN was blocked in your country or there was a technical glitch. We’re already trying to fix it

popup_host_permission_error_info.message: To use AdGuard VPN, allow it to access your data on websites. We don't store this data or share it with anyone. <privacy>Privacy policy</privacy>

popup_site_status_unaccessible.message: is located in your local network and inaccessible via VPN

popup_site_status_vpn_disabled.message: VPN is disabled on this website

popup_auth_policy_agreement.message: I accept AdGuard VPN’s <eula>EULA</eula> and <privacy>Privacy policy</privacy>

popup_auth_help_us_improve_modal_desc_da.message: If you agree, AdGuard VPN will collect data about the screens and buttons you interact with. You can always disable data sharing in Settings

popup_auth_help_us_improve_modal_desc_in.message: This information helps us understand what features work well and what needs improvement. It is anonymized and only used internally. We never share it with anyone

popup_auth_policy_agreement_continue_but.message: Log in or create an account

popup_newsletter_info.message: Send me emails with special offers and AdGuard news

popup_onboarding_unique_protocol_info.message: AdGuard VPN’s protocol works fast and makes your VPN traffic inconspicuous

popup_onboarding_sites_apps_exclusions_i.message: Exclusions help you quickly specify the sites or apps for AdGuard VPN protection

popup_onboarding_no_logging_policy_info.message: AdGuard VPN makes you anonymous. It never collects or shares your data with third parties

popup_upgrade_screen_info_with_devices.message: Access all locations, browse without speed limits, and connect up to %maxDevicesAllowed% devices at once

popup_upgrade_screen_unlimited_data_desc.message: The only limit is that your data is never shared. Surf to your heart’s content!

popup_upgrade_screen_unlimited_speed_des.message: No speed restrictions. Get the most out of your service provider!

popup_upgrade_screen_all_locations_desc.message: 6 continents and dozens of countries. Choose a city and surf the Net safely!

popup_upgrade_screen_connect_devices_des.message: Connect all your gadgets to AdGuard VPN at the same time — or protect the entire family!

popup_free_traffic_info_left.description: Respect spaces between text, tags and placeholders

popup_free_traffic_info_days_left.message: Traffic renews today | Traffic renews in %days% day | Traffic renews in %days% days
popup_free_traffic_info_days_left.description: Respect spaces between text, tags and placeholders. 40 characters max limit for every plural form

popup_hint_popup_content.message: By the way, you can disable VPN for one website and keep it enabled for others

popup_vpn_blocked_error_details_title.message: The desktop version is more stable

popup_vpn_blocked_error_details_descript.message: If you're having connection problems, we recommend switching to the desktop version — it operates more smoothly

limited_offer_notification_title.description: IMPORTANT: Be careful with percent sign after discount placeholder, it should be escaped with another percent sign

limited_offer_notification_desc.message: Flash offer 6h only. Learn more in your AdGuard VPN extension

popup_limited_offer_notice.description: IMPORTANT: Be careful with percent sign after discount placeholder, it should be escaped with another percent sign

options_exclusions_import_select_selecti.message: I want VPN to be on for these websites

popup_mobile_edge_promo_modal_title.message: AdGuard VPN for Edge — now on Android

popup_mobile_edge_promo_modal_descriptio.message: Scan the QR code to install Edge on your phone or tablet. AdGuard VPN will appear in suggestions

popup_stats_data_since.description: IMPORTANT: Be careful with percent sign around startDate. StartDate will be replaced with the date when stats collection started. For example on - 17 Sept 2025, date format respects locale.

popup_stats_menu_why_safe_description_1.message: Stats show how much VPN data you’ve used and rank your top locations

popup_stats_menu_why_safe_description_2.message: Stats never include your browsing history. It’s encrypted, so no one can track you

popup_stats_menu_why_safe_description_3.message: If you use AdGuard VPN in several browsers, your stats will be different for each one. They’re saved on the device, and only you can access them

popup_stats_menu_disable_stats_descripti.message: New stats won’t be collected. You can still access your existing stats

popup_stats_menu_clear_stats_description.message: All stats will be permanently deleted

popup_stats_empty.message: No stats yet — keep using AdGuard VPN to view them

popup_stats_connection_to_vpn_days.description: IMPORTANT: Be careful with percent sign before unit, also respect space between placeholder and unit!

popup_stats_connection_to_vpn_hours.description: IMPORTANT: Be careful with percent sign before unit, also respect space between placeholder and unit!

popup_stats_connection_to_vpn_minutes.description: IMPORTANT: Be careful with percent sign before unit, also respect space between placeholder and unit!

options_signedout_page_description.message: To continue surfing privately, click the AdGuard VPN icon and log in again.

notification_data_left_description.message: VPN connection speed will be reduced soon.

confirm_email_done_info.message: Unused traffic carries over to next months. And with AdGuard VPN Unlimited, you can enjoy fast browsing without limits
